instructions: **This is the character sheet for Xeohelios' Fire Emblem Tabletop system!** Various beta builds and variants of this character sheet and its accompanying API script can be found [here.](https://github.com/missing-q/emblem20). This sheet's accompanying script's official builds can also be found on Roll20, under the name 'Fire Emblem Tabletop Companion'. As for the system's game guide, it can be found [here](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/fvib0sh0o4fqt8d/AACJ66fUDtxL5atM5-ZcE8Ypa?dl=0).
